name: @edx/brand
description: The default branding and SASS theme package containing for Open edX applications. This package is designed to be copied and customized.
author: edX

scripts.build_ci: rm -rf ./dist && ./node_modules/.bin/fedx-scripts babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps --ignore **/*.test.jsx,**/__mocks__,**/__snapshots__,**/setupTest.js --copy-files && rm -rf dist/**/*.test.jsx && rm -rf dist/**/__snapshots__ && rm -rf dist/__mocks__
